title: Query Training Data - Azure AI Search

openaiSpec.name: query_training_data

query.description: The keywords or topics to search for the internal training data. Multiple keywords or topics are accepted (separated with commas).

openaiSpec.description: Search the internal training data for relevant information. When the user ask you something you don't know, you can use this function to search for relevant information in the internal training data. Don't use questions as search query, use keywords instead. The search query should contains the keywords or topics related to the conversation.
